tools.splat.soy

Here you may find some tools that may be useful. These tools are aimed at the Fediverse community.

  • Instance Emoji Viewer
  • Fediverse Instance API Token Generator

OCR

  • https://ocr.space/ - tends to be more accurate
  • https://www.newocr.com/

RSS/Atom Feeds

  • gof - a command-line utility to post RSS/Atom feeds to the fediverse

Browser Add-ons

  • MastoPinner - Save Mastodon posts to Pinboard (Firefox)

Source | Maintained by @prplecake@freeradical.zone
